title: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 Remix
summary: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 Remix[lower-alpha 1] is an HD remastered collection of three games in Square Enix's Kingdom Hearts series: Kingdom Hearts II, Birth by Sleep and Re:coded. A successor to the series' HD 1.5 Remix collection, it was released for the PlayStation 3 in Japan in October 2014 and internationally two months later.
